entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (tatooine_espa_peggin.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_18: I am looking for a droid casing you bought from Watto.
entries.s_20: Why would you be looking for that?
entries.s_24: No, it didn't work with the standard R2 components I had, so I threw it out.
entries.s_25: Did you ever find that part you were looking for?
entries.s_29: Just a couple of days ago, but it won't do you any good. The Jawas already came and sifted through the trash. The casing was one of the first things they took.
entries.s_31: Can you tell me where the Jawas went?
entries.s_33: Sure, to their trading fort. Here are the directions.
entries.s_43: I am doing very well also!
entries.s_47: Well, I need to get back to work. Nice meeting you.
entries.s_57: Well, I am sure you will find it eventually.
entries.s_62: I heard you were able to find that droid part you were looking for.
entries.s_66: I am doing very well, also.
entries.s_70: Well, I need to get back to work. Nice meeting you.
entries.s_78: I suppose that's better than feeling bad!
entries.s_82: Well, I need to get back to work. Nice meeting you.
entries.s_90: I'm sorry. I hope it gets better for you.
entries.s_94: Well, I need to get back to work. Take care.
